parking: Plenty of street parking in Barlovento. Car park near tourist information office.
Very restricted narrow streets with practically no parking options.
Multiple small places, try Calle Vicente San Juan round the back of the big church.

taxi: 4WD taxis carrying 8 passengers run from the taxi hut near the finish to Casa del Monte. Book in advance.

parking: Some parking by the hut, more up the road.
Park near Barco de la Virgen or on Avenida Marítima and walk to the start.

bus.notes: Route 23 stops at Hotel Princess and Volcan San Antonio (on request).

notes: There is a small beach near the lighthouses.

bus.notes: Route 23 stops at Hotel Princess and Volcan San Antonio (request).

parking: Some free spaces before the entrance or in the carpark if you have a visitor centre ticket.

bus.notes: The visitor centre is a request stop

notes: The volcano is a short walk down from Los Canarios

parking: Plenty of spaces at the recreation area.
notes: Accessed from a froestry path off the LP-2 road. Enquire at Los Canarios information centre for track conditions.
Taxis run from Centro de Visitante.

parking: Parking spots up Calle Campanario and more further on up the track.
notes: Small village but with tiny shop and Pizzeria Evangelina

parking: Some parking by the church, more up Calle Tamanca by the Virgen de Fátima shrine.

bus.notes: Stop is opposite the El Americano bar

notes: You can walk to Centro de Interpretación del tubo volcánico Cueva de Las Palomas from here.

parking: Large car park at the rear, some parking in the front.
notes: On the LP-3 road about half way between El Paso and the Cumbre Nueva tunnel.

parking: Car park at the rear of Plaza de Bujaz
notes: Has an attractive plaza and some good restaurants.

parking: Parking spot by a wall at the start along Calle Cuesta de la Juliana.
notes: Tacande is within walking distance of El Paso

parking: A couple of spaces where the tarmac ends, more at the notice board further up the track.
notes: Taxi from Centro de Visitantes to the end of the tarmac.
Book in advance on the official website or come out of hours. Barrier on the approach road.
